document_data.name: Ristamar Rhaal
document_data.mainbody: '''Ristamar Rhaal''' was a mercenary recruiter in [[Amn]].
document_data.Personality: Lord Rhaal was a very dignified man, but he still maintained a sense of humor.
document_data.Activities:
Ristamar was an Amnian noble and the chairman of the council of [[Boar's Head]]s of the [[Order of the Blue Boar]], as well as the owner of [[Castle Blue]]. He usually dealt with major government issues, thanks to his connections as a noble.

When in combat, Ristamar wore a suit of [[Full plate|full plate armor]] and led cavalry units.
